name: Escape the Maze
short_description: A quick trip to a local maze goes awry when you stumble into an overgrown forest full of monsters and a strange, creepy castle.  Armed with only a small keyboard and a hand to play it with, you attempt to fend off the monsters without causing any harm to the innocent local critters.  And when you fail, the monsters start to close in... will you be able to Escape the Maze?
summary: Fight monsters with music while escaping a maze.
